Uses of Interface
com.meltmedia.cadmium.cli.CliCommand

Packages that use CliCommand
com.meltmedia.cadmium.cli   
 

Uses of CliCommand in com.meltmedia.cadmium.cli
 

Classes in com.meltmedia.cadmium.cli that implement CliCommand
 class CheckGithubTokenCommand
          A Cadmium cli command that does nothing other then force the CadmiumCli instance to check and authorized the current user with a GitHub API token.
 class CloneCommand
          CLI Command that clones the content from a source to a target.
 class CommitCommand
          Replaces the content in a git repository branch with the contents of a given directory and tells a Cadmium site to update to it.
 class DeployCommand
          This command is used to tell a Cadmium-Deployer instance to create and deploy a new Cadmium war.
 class HistoryCommand
          Retrieves and displays the history of the requested Cadmium site in a human readable format.
 class InitializeContentCommand
          Creates a content directory for a Cadmium site.
 class InitializeProjectCommand
          Deprecated.  
 class InitializeWarCommand
          Initializes a Cadmium site war for deployment without Cadmium Deployer war.
 class MaintenanceCommand
          Controls a Cadmium sites maintenance page.
 class NewBranchCommand
          Deprecated.  
 class RevertCommand
          Displays the history of a Cadmium site and allows a selection of a revertable history entry to revert the site to, in normal mode.
 class StatusCommand
          Displays the status information from a Cadmium site.
 class UndeployCommand
          Displays a list of Cadmium wars deployed to a JBoss server with a Cadmium-Deployer war deployed and tells it to undeploy any of them.
 class UpdateCommand
          Sends a raw update command to a Cadmium site.
 class ValidateCommand
          Parses all html files in a directory with a Jerry Library.
